content.original: This 'Cooling Jacket' is barely more than a Heat Exchanger wired around the arm actuators, I must say, I'm actually impressed at this  ...if doesn't blow up that is.
content.prevOriginal: This 'Cooling Jacket' is barely more than a Heat Exchanger wired around the arm actuators, I must say, I'm actually impressed at this  ...if doesn't blow up that is.
content.content: 这个冷却套只是一个连接到手臂机构周围的热交换器,我必须说,我对此印象深刻......如果它不爆炸的话.

content.original: Fuel Cell engines are primarily used in civilian applications like rail systems, personal transport, and IndustrialMechs. Fuel Cell engines generate electrical power that is then used by the vehicle to operate its propulsion system. A Fuel Cell engine has several advantages over the typical Internal Combustion Engine. While they require an oxidizer to operate, they are readily able to accept a stored oxidizer along with their fuel, making it a good choice for submarines, satellites, and naval applications. As most fuel cells run on hydrogen and oxygen, they have no exhaust other than water vapor so Fuel Cells are also used as generators for buildings and other large structures. Cannot use Additional Cooling Kits, Exchanger or Banks.
content.prevOriginal: Fuel Cell engines are primarily used in civilian applications like rail systems, personal transport, and IndustrialMechs. Fuel Cell engines generate electrical power that is then used by the vehicle to operate its propulsion system. A Fuel Cell engine has several advantages over the typical Internal Combustion Engine. While they require an oxidizer to operate, they are readily able to accept a stored oxidizer along with their fuel, making it a good choice for submarines, satellites, and naval applications. As most fuel cells run on hydrogen and oxygen, they have no exhaust other than water vapor so Fuel Cells are also used as generators for buildings and other large structures. Cannot use Additional Cooling Kits, Exchanger or Banks.
content.content: 燃料电池发动机主要用于轨道系统、个人运输和工业机甲等民间应用.燃料电池发动机产生电力,然后由载具用于操作其推进系统.燃料电池发动机与普通的内燃机相比具有几个优点.虽然它们都需要氧化剂才能运行,但它们可以随时使用储存的氧化剂及燃料,这使其成为潜艇、卫星和海军应用的良好选择.由于大多数燃料电池依靠氢气和氧气运行,它们除了水蒸气之外没有废气,因此燃料电池也被用作建筑物和其他大型结构的发电机.无法使用额外冷却套件、换热器或蓄热器.
燃料电池额外严重损伤
燃料电池额外严重损伤
燃料电池额外严重损伤
燃料电池额外严重损伤
燃料电池额外严重损伤
燃料电池额外严重损伤
燃料电池额外严重损伤

content.original: For all intents and purposes identical to a modern internal combustion engine, the I.C.E. in BattleTech is used mainly for conventional vehicles and IndustrialMechs. Its power output is less than a fusion engine of similar mass, meaning an I.C.E. needs to be heavier in order to have the same engine rating of a fusion engine.
content.prevOriginal: For all intents and purposes identical to a modern internal combustion engine, the I.C.E. in BattleTech is used mainly for conventional vehicles and IndustrialMechs. Its power output is less than a fusion engine of similar mass, meaning an I.C.E. needs to be heavier in order to have the same engine rating of a fusion engine.
content.content: 与现代内燃机的作用和意义相同,BattleTech中的内燃机主要用于常规车辆和工业领域.他的输出功率远小于同重量的聚变发动机,这意味着要输出与聚变发动机相同的功率,内燃机会更重.

content.original: ICE has reduced speed but grants reduced Heat Generated
content.prevOriginal: ICE has reduced speed but grants reduced Heat Generated
content.content: 内燃机降低速度但是也减少了产热

content.original: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.
content.prevOriginal: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.
content.content: 聚变引擎的功能是以轻氢和钚为燃料获得聚变反应的能量. 聚变引擎根据其引擎额定功率区分.对于机甲来说,引擎额定功率是其重量和最大步行或巡航速度的数学乘积.

content.original: A Mech' Cooling System provides heat dissipation for components inside the mech and compatible extension points for additional heat sinks throughout the mech.
content.prevOriginal: A Mech' Cooling System provides heat dissipation for components inside the mech and compatible extension points for additional heat sinks throughout the mech.
content.content: 机甲的冷却系统为机甲的内部部件提供冷却,并更改机甲上外部散热器挂载点的适配类型.

content.original: While otherwise identical to standard BattleMech Armor, Clan Armor incorporates C.A.S.E. technology. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: While otherwise identical to standard BattleMech Armor, Clan Armor incorporates C.A.S.E. technology. CASE Enabled
content.content: 和标准战斗机甲装甲几乎完全一样,但氏族装甲采用了C.A.S.E.技术.启用CASE

content.original: The Artemis V Fire Control System is an improved, next generation version of the ubiquitous Artemis IV FCS, capable to guide missiles with even greater accuracy.Cannot be used with other Missile TTS and enables using Artemis IV Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Artemis V Fire Control System is an improved, next generation version of the ubiquitous Artemis IV FCS, capable to guide missiles with even greater accuracy.Cannot be used with other Missile TTS and enables using Artemis IV Ammo.
content.content: 月神V火控系统是无处不在的月神IV火控系统的改进的下一个版本,能够更高精度的引导导弹不能和其他导弹TTS一起使用可以使用月神IV弹药.

content.original: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.
content.content: 被动:使用单武器攻击时忽略目标的遮蔽和警戒状态.

content.original: Missile weapon attacks have their hit improved by 3.
content.prevOriginal: Missile weapon attacks have their hit improved by 3.

content.original: Substantially increases the clustering of this unit's LRM weapons and boosts the stability damage of SRMs by 50%.
content.prevOriginal: Substantially increases the clustering of this unit's LRM weapons and boosts the stability damage of SRMs by 50%.
content.content: 大大增加了该单位LRM武器的群组命中,将SRM的稳定伤害提高50%.

content.original: Developed during the Age of War, Primitive Armor was introduced on the Mackie, the original BattleMech. This armor was less capable than the armor used in Star League and Succession War designs.
content.prevOriginal: Developed during the Age of War, Primitive Armor was introduced on the Mackie, the original BattleMech. This armor was less capable than the armor used in Star League and Succession War designs.
content.content: 在战争年代被开发出来,原始装甲被引入了起源战斗机甲'麦基'中.这种装甲性能不如星联和继承战争时期使用的装甲.

content.original: Standard BattleMech armor is composed of several layers providing various degrees of protection and support. The first layer is extremely strong titanium alloyed with steel, the result of crystal alignment and radiation treatment, which is also very brittle. The second layer is a ceramic, cubic boron nitride, which combined with a web of artificial diamond fibers acts as a backstop to the steel layer. These two layers rest atop a titanium alloy honeycomb structure which provides support, and a layer of self-sealing polymer sealant which allows for space and underwater operations.
content.prevOriginal: Standard BattleMech armor is composed of several layers providing various degrees of protection and support. The first layer is extremely strong titanium alloyed with steel, the result of crystal alignment and radiation treatment, which is also very brittle. The second layer is a ceramic, cubic boron nitride, which combined with a web of artificial diamond fibers acts as a backstop to the steel layer. These two layers rest atop a titanium alloy honeycomb structure which provides support, and a layer of self-sealing polymer sealant which allows for space and underwater operations.
content.content: 标准战斗机甲装甲有多层材料组成,以为不同类型场景提供保护和支持.第一层是经过晶体重排和辐射处理的极硬钛合金,但也非常脆.第二层是陶瓷立方氮化硼和人造碳纳米管的结合,以支撑上面的钢层.这两层之下是用于提供支撑的钛合金蜂窝结构和一层使机甲能安全的在真空和水下操作的聚合物自密封剂.

content.original: While Functionally similar to Standard BattleMech Armor has Heavy Industrial Armor special reinforcements to securely enhance a 'Mech with Triple Strength Myomer.
content.prevOriginal: While Functionally similar to Standard BattleMech Armor has Heavy Industrial Armor special reinforcements to securely enhance a 'Mech with Triple Strength Myomer.
content.content: 虽然功能上和标准战斗机甲的装甲类似,但使用重型工业装甲专门加强,以便机甲可以安全的获得三倍强化人工肌肉(TSM)的增强.

content.original: The Chameleon Light Polarization Shield was designed to make a 'Mech invisible to the naked eye. By using a primitive mimetic system, the outline of the 'Mech carrying it was broken up, blending into the surrounding terrain. The Chameleon was very effective because unlike the Null Signature System it worked against sensor systems and visual observation. Reserves 12 slots and contains an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: The Chameleon Light Polarization Shield was designed to make a 'Mech invisible to the naked eye. By using a primitive mimetic system, the outline of the 'Mech carrying it was broken up, blending into the surrounding terrain. The Chameleon was very effective because unlike the Null Signature System it worked against sensor systems and visual observation. Reserves 12 slots and contains an ECM.
content.content: 变色龙偏光护盾(LPS)是为了让机甲肉眼不可见而设计的.使用原始的模拟系统,装备它的机甲轮廓被打碎融入到周围地形中.变色龙非常有效,因为它与零信号系统不同,它可以对抗传感器系统和视觉观察.它占用12个槽位并包含一个ECM.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更难被发现和侦测

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to see with eyes
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更被肉眼看到

content.original: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Cockpit and Life Support, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.prevOriginal: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Cockpit and Life Support, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.content: 所有的机甲都装备了可以通过升级来提升表现的座舱和生命支持系统.

content.original: The Primitive Cockpit is functionally similar to the modern BattleMech cockpit, but due to the bulkier components, it weighs five tons instead of three.  It lacks an ejection seat and the sensors are even worse than that of a standard IndustrialMech's
content.prevOriginal: The Primitive Cockpit is functionally similar to the modern BattleMech cockpit, but due to the bulkier components, it weighs five tons instead of three.  It lacks an ejection seat and the sensors are even worse than that of a standard IndustrialMech's
content.content: 原始座舱功能上和现代座舱相似,但由于使用了笨重的部件,其重量为5吨而不是3吨.它没有弹射座椅,传感器甚至比现在的工业机甲还差.

content.original: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.
content.content: 被动:使用单武器攻击时忽略目标的遮蔽和警戒状态.

content.original: A StarLeague Defense Forces Standard Spec cockpit, complete with ballistic armored cooling suit.
content.prevOriginal: A StarLeague Defense Forces Standard Spec cockpit, complete with ballistic armored cooling suit.
content.content: 星联防卫部队(SLDF)标准规格座舱,配有弹道装甲和冷却套件.

content.original: Based on the Armored Cowl design, Solaris Arm's upgrades this cockpit with a hardened cage and an IFF Jammer; enabling it to take heavier hits with ease.
content.prevOriginal: Based on the Armored Cowl design, Solaris Arm's upgrades this cockpit with a hardened cage and an IFF Jammer; enabling it to take heavier hits with ease.
content.content: 在装甲前围设计的基础上,索拉里斯武装使用更坚固的舱体和敌我识别干扰系统升级了这种座舱;使其能轻松承受更重的打击.

content.original: Solaris Arms Hardened Cage Cockpit Mod
content.prevOriginal: Solaris Arms Hardened Cage Cockpit Mod
content.content: 索拉里斯武装硬化舱体座舱模块

content.original: Default Clan FCS. A Mech's Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.
content.prevOriginal: Default Clan FCS. A Mech's Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.
content.content: 默认的氏族火控系统(FCS).机甲的火控系统协调并分析传感器带来的大量数据,以便跟踪部队、生成射击方案和命中目标.

content.original: Default SLDF FCS. A Mech's Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.

content.original: A Society FCS Package attuned to the BattleMech's internals, it's great efficiency leads to improved Heat Regulation. A Mech's Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.

A Mech's Fire Control System coordinates and analyzes the vast amount of information brought in by Sensors in order to track units, generate firing solutions and hit targets.
content.content: 一个与战斗机甲内部结构相适应的协会火控系统包,它的高效率使热调节得到改善.机甲的火控系统协调并分析传感器带来的大量数据,以便跟踪部队、生成射击方案和命中目标.

content.original: This appears to be a bog standard Bulldozer Blade that some yokel decided to heavily reinforce. Looks like they even added some targeting lasers and scanners to it so they could line up their charges better without the blade interfering with their sighting. Use at your own risk, Boss.
content.prevOriginal: This appears to be a bog standard Bulldozer Blade that some yokel decided to heavily reinforce. Looks like they even added some targeting lasers and scanners to it so they could line up their charges better without the blade interfering with their sighting. Use at your own risk, Boss.
content.content: 这似乎一个标准的推土机铲,一些乡巴佬决定将它大力加强.看起来他们甚至加装一些瞄准激光和扫描仪,这样他们可以在不干扰视线的情况下更好的进行充能.使用它有风险,老板.

content.original: Gyros counteract the massive amounts of momentum generated from 'Mech engines and allow for precision maneuvering and recovery from stability-impacting attacks. All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Gyro, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.prevOriginal: Gyros counteract the massive amounts of momentum generated from 'Mech engines and allow for precision maneuvering and recovery from stability-impacting attacks. All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Gyro, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.content: 陀螺仪抵消了机甲引擎产生的大量动量,并允许精确机动并从稳定性攻击中恢复.所有机甲都配置了陀螺仪,可以升级以提高性能.

content.original: This started life as a 'Coventry Dreadnought', but the salvage technicians damaged a few bits and bobs when cutting it free from the unit it was installed in. It comes with vastly superior Control systems directly allowing the passive system to angle the Mech's Armour to deflect incoming Attacks with maximum efficiency.
content.prevOriginal: This started life as a 'Coventry Dreadnought', but the salvage technicians damaged a few bits and bobs when cutting it free from the unit it was installed in. It comes with vastly superior Control systems directly allowing the passive system to angle the Mech's Armour to deflect incoming Attacks with maximum efficiency.
content.content: 它最初是一艘'考文垂无畏舰',但打捞技术人员在将它从安装的单元中切割出来时损坏了一些碎片和摇摆.配备了非常优秀的控制系统,直接允许被动系统调整机甲装甲的角度,以最大效率对来袭的攻击.

content.original: A Unique variant of the Ultralight Gyro linked to advanced Stabilized providing size and weight saving benefits without the stability penalty.
content.prevOriginal: A Unique variant of the Ultralight Gyro linked to advanced Stabilized providing size and weight saving benefits without the stability penalty.
content.content: 特型陀螺仪的一个独特变体,和高级稳定器连接,在不影响稳定性的情况下减小了尺寸并节省了重量.

content.original: A Basic Clan Cockpits Sensor Package is a step above comparable Inner Sphere packages. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by combat vehicles, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.prevOriginal: A Basic Clan Cockpits Sensor Package is a step above comparable Inner Sphere packages. Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by combat vehicles, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.
content.content: 一个基础的氏族座舱传感器包,和内天体的版本相比更加先进.热成像、光学缩放、雷达和磁异常传感器作为机甲的主要传感器,辅以地面震动传感器、运动传感器、化学分析仪和其他多种传感器.

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by combat vehicles, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.

Thermal imaging, light amplification, radar and magnetic anomaly sensors are all among the primary sensors used by combat vehicles, supplemented by seismic sensors, motion detectors, chemical analyzers and a multitude of others.

content.original: This Endo Composite Structure got interwoven with a Triple Strength Myomer prototype that grants improved Speed and Melee Damage.
content.prevOriginal: This Endo Composite Structure got interwoven with a Triple Strength Myomer prototype that grants improved Speed and Melee Damage.
content.content: 这种内构钢复合结构与三倍强化人工肌肉(TSM)原型交织在一起,提高了速度和近战伤害.
更强的近战和更快的速度

content.original: The Internal Structure of a BattleMech forms the skeletal structure of the 'Mech to which all components are mounted. The Standard Internal Structure of a 'Mech weighs 10% of its max tonnage.
content.prevOriginal: The Internal Structure of a BattleMech forms the skeletal structure of the 'Mech to which all components are mounted. The Standard Internal Structure of a 'Mech weighs 10% of its max tonnage.
content.content: 机甲的内部结构由安装好所有组件的骨架结构组成,机甲的标准内构重量为其最大吨位的10%.
